verses.roman:
manvantarāvatāra ebe śuna, sanātana
asaṅkhya gaṇana tāṅra, śunaha kāraṇa

synonyms: manu-antara-avatāra—the Manu incarnations; ebe—now; śuna—hear; sanātana—O Sanātana Gosvāmī; asaṅkhya—unlimited; gaṇana—counting; tāṅra—of them; śunaha—just hear; kāraṇa—the cause.
translation: "O Sanātana, just hear about the Manu incarnations [manvantara-avatāras]. They are unlimited, and no one can count them. Just hear of their source.
